typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		CityID as integer,
		CityName as string,
		StateProvinceID as integer,
		Location as binary,
		LatestRecordedPopulation as long,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> odsCities
source(output(
		CityKey as integer,
		CityID as integer,
		CityName as string,
		Location as binary,
		LatestRecordedPopulation as long,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		CurrentFlag as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> IntegrationCities
odsCities derive(CurrentFlag = 1) ~> addingCurrentFlag
IntegrationCities select(mapColumn(
		old_CityKey = CityKey,
		old_CityID = CityID,
		old_CityName = CityName,
		old_Location = Location,
		old_LatestRecordedPopulation = LatestRecordedPopulation,
		old_LastEditedBy = LastEditedBy,
		old_ValidFrom = ValidFrom,
		old_ValidTo = ValidTo,
		old_CurrentFlag = CurrentFlag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
odsCities, Select1 lookup(CityID == old_CityID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 filter(!isNull(old_CityID)) ~> ExsitingRows
ExsitingRows select(mapColumn(
		old_CityKey,
		old_CityID,
		old_CityName,
		old_Location,
		old_LatestRecordedPopulation,
		old_LastEditedBy,
		old_ValidFrom,
		old_ValidTo,
		old_CurrentFlag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 derive(old_CurrentFlag = 0) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(1 == 1)) ~> AlterRow1
addingCurrentFlag sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CityKey as integer,
		CityID as integer,
		CityName as string,
		Location as binary,
		LatestRecordedPopulation as long,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		CurrentFlag as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		CityID,
		CityName,
		Location,
		LatestRecordedPopulation,
		LastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom,
		ValidTo,
		CurrentFlag
	)) ~> sink1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CityKey as integer,
		CityID as integer,
		CityName as string,
		Location as binary,
		LatestRecordedPopulation as long,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		CurrentFlag as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['CityKey'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		CityKey = old_CityKey,
		CityID = old_CityID,
		CityName = old_CityName,
		Location = old_Location,
		LatestRecordedPopulation = old_LatestRecordedPopulation,
		LastEditedBy = old_LastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom = old_ValidFrom,
		ValidTo = old_ValidTo,
		CurrentFlag = old_CurrentFlag
	)) ~> sink2
